data.title: Kastamonu vs Zamiin-Uud Climate & Distance Between
data.text:
The distance between Kastamonu, Turkey and Zamiin-Uud, Mongolia is approximately 6,155 km or 3,825 mi.

To reach Kastamonu in this distance one would set out from Zamiin-Uud bearing 296.8° or WNW and follow the great circles arc to approach Kastamonu bearing 239.3&deg or WSW .

Kastamonu has a marine west coast climate (Cfb) whereas Zamiin-Uud has a mid-latitude cool desert climate (BWk).

Kastamonu is in or near the cool temperate steppe biome whereas Zamiin-Uud is in or near the boreal moist forest biome.

The annual average temperature is 6.2 °C (11.1°F) warmer.

Average monthly temperatures vary by 20.4 °C (36.7°F) less in Kastamonu. The continentality subtype is semicontinental as opposed to truly continental.

Total annual precipitation averages 372.6 mm (14.7 in) more which is equivalent to 372.6 l/m² (9.14 US gal/ft²) or 3,726,000 l/ha (398,334 US gal/ac) more. About 4 1/3 as much.

The altitude of the sun at midday is overall 2.3° higher in Kastamonu than in Zamiin-Uud.

Climate Comparison Table
